title: India : number of internet users 2015 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: Overall Number of internet users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Number of internet users in millions, about 564.5 was reported at Year 2020
Minimum Number of internet users in millions about 259.88 was reached at Year 2015
min_summary: In general Number of internet users in millions has rose over the Year.
